name: Snow Plow Truck Excavator Sim
description:
Winter season has started, there is massive snowfall in the city, due to which the major city roads are blocked. Play as rescue snow excavator driver, and clear all the roads for public. You are behind the wheels of a heavy plow truck in a much more detailed gaming experience. Driving of snow excavator and heavy crane in the slippery road is not easy, so drive carefully and prove yourself as a pro driver. Here, you have a time limit, try to complete the objective before the time runs out.

Game Features:

- Smooth Excavator Controls
- Stunning graphics
- Complete 30 Challenging levels
- Detailed 3d city
- Amazing game-play

HOW TO PLAY:

- Tap Play Button to start the game
- Tap left /right or steering to steer your vehicle
- Tap Accelerator to speed up your excavator
- Tap Brake button to stop or reduce the speed
- Complete the current level to play next level
- Avoid hitting any hurdles or other cars
